医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Gavi 承诺提供超过 18 亿美元支持非洲疫苗生产疫苗联盟 Gavi 表示，已承诺提供超过 18 亿美元支持非洲的疫苗生产，此举可能有助于非洲大陆解决历史上对进口疫苗的依赖问题，并建立自己强大的生物技术部门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Gavi-commits-more-than-US2418-billion-to-support-vaccine-product-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Gavi-commits-more-than-US2418-billion-to-support-vaccine-product-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caedb6d2-7455-43a5-802e-e50c42759dd8 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 10:40:05 -0500 Gavi commits more than US$1.8 billion to support vaccine production in Africa
耶拿科学家获得线粒体和神经退行性疾病治疗研究资助Kanstantsin Siniuk 博士是耶拿莱布尼茨老龄化研究所 Helmut Pospiech 博士项目组的博士后研究员，他的开创性项目线粒体和神经退行性疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Jena-scientist-receives-grant-for-research-on-mitochondrial-and-neurodogenic-disease-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Jena-scientist-receives-grant-for-research-on-mitochondrial-and-neurodogenic-disease-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bbfd007-e1d1-4ea6-bb6c-233f8e54674c Tue, 12 Dec 2023 10:36:49 -0500 Jena scientist receives grant for research on mitochondrial and neurodegenerative disease treatments

从复杂到简单：读板机的新时代在接受 NewsMedical 采访时，Yousef Nazirizadeh 博士深入了解了 Byonoy 读板机的先进功能和多种类型，强调了它们在行业中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/From-complexity-to-simplicity-The-new-era-of-plate-readers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/From-complexity-to-simplicity-The-new-era-of-plate-readers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b5ff76d-156a-4b2c-982d-4a7a8d8c4e3e Tue, 12 Dec 2023 08:15:00 -0500 From complexity to simplicity: The new era of plate readers
残疾人希望自动驾驶汽车能够带来独立性米尔娜·彼得森 (Myrna Peterson) 预测，自动驾驶汽车将成为像她这样生活在大城市之外、因身体残疾而无法开车的人摆脱孤立和孤独的一张门票。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/People-with-disability-hope-autonomous-vehicles-deliver-independence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/People-with-disability-hope-autonomous-vehicles-deliver-independence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5a9ab00-3969-4e5e-add9-70654e620bff Tue, 12 Dec 2023 07:56:43 -0500 People with disabilities hope autonomous vehicles deliver independence
听着：我们对医疗债务长达两年的调查揭示了什么在全国范围内，美国人正在失去家园，耗尽退休账户，并因医疗债务而难以养家糊口。两年来，KFF 健康新闻和 NPR 一直通过“诊断：债务”项目调查这场危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Listen-What-our-2-year-long-investigation-into-medical-debt-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Listen-What-our-2-year-long-investigation-into-medical-debt-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccaa487d-6cc3-4baf-8ea0-ee97a5179551 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 07:54:55 -0500 Listen: What our 2-year-long investigation into medical debt reveals
洛杉矶县投入巨资为 K-12 学生提供免费虚拟心理健康治疗洛杉矶县公立学校正在推出一项雄心勃勃的计划，为 130 万 K-12 学生提供免费心理健康服务，这是对加州州长加文·纽森 (Gavin Newsom) 耗资 47 亿美元解决青少年心理健康危机的全面计划的一项关键考验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/LA-County-invests-big-in-free-virtual-mental-health-therapy-for-K-12-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/LA-County-invests-big-in-free-virtual-mental-health-therapy-for-K-12-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dbfebf8-1227-4f65-843e-cb5a1dfb5894 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 07:51:00 -0500 LA County invests big in free virtual mental health therapy for K-12 students
PharmaKure 和玛拉工艺大学 (UiTM) 宣布合作推进阿尔茨海默病诊断研究研究合作伙伴关系旨在建立强大的制药和学术合作，共享数据和临床样本，开发基于生物标记的阿尔茨海默病诊断方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/PharmaKure-and-Universiti-Teknologi-MARA-(UiTM)-announce-partnership-to-advance-research-in-Alzheimere28099s-Disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/PharmaKure-and-Universiti-Teknologi-MARA-(UiTM)-announce-partnership-to-advance-research-in-Alzheimere28099s-Disease-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=722050b7-9891-44b3-b739-e043d0d600a6 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 07:41:00 -0500 PharmaKure and Universiti Teknologi MARA (UiTM) announce partnership to advance research in Alzheimer’s Disease diagnosis
